first_convo: Welcome young one! I can sense that you are here to take my challenge, and try earn my prize.
Well, Are you here to try to amuse me or actually prove your worth? Are you worthy to complete the dojos fights of glory?
I suppose we will see, after you pass my three challenges. First, I will test your wisdom. Then, I shall test your strength. Finally, I shall test your courage.
Are you ready to undertake these challenges? Come to me when you are ready to begin.
